price: 35. Kay addal deedal maxcoo kee dirabboysiyyak tu mayaabban.
arabic: لَّا يَسۡمَعُونَ فِيهَا لَغۡوٗا وَلَا كِذَّٰبٗا

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: lā yasmaʿūna fīhā laghwan walā kidhāban
